brandNotifications.Seiko: Please ensure you have the original warranty card for Seiko watches.
brandNotifications.Casio: Casio requires a copy of the purchase receipt for all warranty claims.
brandNotifications.Timex: Timex warranty claims must be submitted within 30 days of the issue occurring.
brandNotifications.Aistrup: Aistrup watches have a 2-year warranty period from the date of purchase.
brandNotifications.Fibex: Fibex requires detailed photos of the issue for all warranty claims.
brandNotifications.Others: For brands not listed, please provide as much information about the purchase and issue as possible.

faq.question1: How do I submit a warranty claim?
faq.answer1: To submit a warranty claim, click on the 'New Claim' button and fill out the form with your order details and problem description.
faq.question2: What information do I need for a return?
faq.answer2: For a return, you'll need your order number, email address, and a reason for the return. Click on 'New Return' to start the process.
faq.question3: How long does it take to process a claim or return?
faq.answer3: Processing times may vary, but we typically handle claims and returns within 5-75-7 business days. You can check the status of your claim or return at any time using the 'Check Status' feature.

errorSubmittingReturn: An error occurred while submitting the return
